document_data.name: Golden Horn Gambling House
document_data.mainbody: The '''Golden Horn Gambling House''', which was also simply called the '''Golden Horn''', was a [[festhall]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The festhall stood three stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Golden Horn Gambling House was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the north end of [[Snail Street]] where it was met by [[Niles Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
document_data.Services: Drugs could also be purchased within the Golden Horn.
document_data.Inhabitants: A [[doppelganger]] named [[Ptola]] posed as a courtesan at the Golden Horn Gambling House.
